entry.title: Longshot - Screenshot & OCR
entry.content:
优惠信息

App 內購買

  • Pro version lifetime：$390.00 → $320.00

应用描述

## Annotation and Color Picking Conveniently annotate the screen, a great helper for communicating with colleagues, simple and easy to use. - Drawing tools, shapes, ovals, lines, arrows, text, marker pen, freehand drawing. - Annotation and measurement, mosaic, blur, annotation notes, measure pixel distances, color picking, rich functions. - Step annotation, clear expression of ideas, customizable number content - Convenient operations, shortcuts, undo, save, open, copy to clipboard, easy and simple. ## Scrolling Capture Optimized image stitching algorithm makes scrolling capture adaptable to various environments, easily capture conversation context scrolling up and down. - Vertical/horizontal/360 degrees, support vertical, horizontal, panoramic scrolling capture, scroll any direction to capture. - Non-solid color background/non-scrolling areas, capture area can include non-scrolling objects with non-solid color background, good scrolling capture screenshot stitching. - Dynamically adjust scrolling direction/area, can change scrolling direction and readjust capture area after completion for restitching during scrolling. - Entire window scrolling capture, hold Option to capture entire scrolling window screenshot, automatic edge area handling. ## OCR Text Recognition Offline OCR algorithm with emphasis on privacy protection. Quickly extract text from images, videos, documents or anywhere. - Select screen area, recognize text, copy to clipboard, paste to notes, editors, messages etc. - Support QR and barcode recognition, quickly open corresponding links. - Support text-to-speech playback of recognized text. ## Screen Element Measurement Quickly measure any content on screen, automatically recognize distances and element sizes. - Measure distance, automatically recognize distance between elements or objects on screen, annotate distance. - Measure element, just select approximate element area, can automatically snap to element and annotate size. - Support distance and element edge color tolerance adjustment for more precise localization. ## Image Pinning Turn images, text from anywhere into desktop pins for convenient comparison. - Clipboard pinning, pin images, text, HTML etc. from clipboard to desktop. - Double-click pinned image, double-click pinned image or open pinned image on desktop to view. - Pinned image scrolling, scroll pinned image, double-click to close or minimize, support flipping and mirroring etc image operations. ## Screen Recording Quickly record steps, one click to record full screen, selected area or window for easy sharing. - Support full-screen, region and window recording, application recording. - Support system sound, microphone recording, frame rate settings etc. ## Window Capture Select window to highlight subject, make capture area better convey intent. - Intelligent window recognition, automatically highlight window mouse is in. - Multiple window combinations, hold Shift to select multiple windows for combined capture. ## Contact Full introduction: https://longshot.chitaner.com Email: office.chitaner@gmail.com QQ group: 780402788 ## Purchase Lifetime license of Longshot Pro allows unlimited screenshot scrolling, step annotation, element measurement and sizing annotation, OCR text recognition, custom hotkeys -
